overview: A kitten was bought for a girl at the bird market, and he became a favorite in the musician's family. But accidentally Tigrasha, as he was called, fell out of the window and hit the canvas roof of the Gazelle. As a result of a trip to New Year's Moscow, Tigrasha left far from his home. He was lucky - he fell into the hands of a lonely kind man who had already sheltered many cats in his little room.
title: Kitty
